messages.subject: Unschooling Family Farm Camp in Costa Rica for 4 to 6 year-olds!
messages.msgSnippet: My name is Anna and I am mother to Ari, 4 years-old and Lela 2 years-old. My family is building a farm and alternative learning center
messages.messageBody:
My name is Anna and I am mother to Ari, 4 years-old and Lela 2
years-old. My family is building a farm and alternative learning center
<http://www.raicesdelsol.org> in the mountains of Costa Rica and I
wanted to share the info about an awesome unschooling style farm camp
that my we are organizing on our farm this summer for 4 to 6 year-olds:

Discover the magic of farming and alternative living in the gorgeous
mountains of Costa Rica! Children ages 4 to 6 years old enjoy camp
activities while parents can participate in select farm work, join in
exciting natural building projects, or simply relax in a hammock and
enjoy the incredible nature and wildlife.


Space is limited so register today: contact@...
And for more information visit: www.raicesdelsol.org/summer-camp/
<www.raicesdelsol.org/summer-camp/>









[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
